text:
Really cool, looks like we’re likely to add support for two more languages thanks to some awesome translators: French and Japanese.
Once we have that - we will officially support all of the languages that HubSpot supports.

We don’t currently have users whose OS language is set to Japanese, but we definitely have some French users, so I’m glad to be able to give them a better experience and I’m interested to see if Japanese support will grow the Japanese HS development community.
